member.name: M:WebApplication1.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter
member.summary: Html to PDF converter component (C# WkHtmlToPdf process wrapper).

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.PdfToolPath
member.summary: Get or set path where WkHtmlToPdf tool is located
member.remarks: By default this property points to the folder where application assemblies are located. If WkHtmlToPdf tool files are not present PdfConverter expands them from DLL resources.

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.WkHtmlToPdfExeName
member.summary: Get or set WkHtmlToPdf tool EXE file name ('wkhtmltopdf.exe' by default)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.TempFilesPath
member.summary: Get or set location for temp files (if not specified location returned by is used for temp files)
member.remarks: Temp files are used for providing cover page/header/footer HTML templates to wkhtmltopdf tool.

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Orientation
member.summary: Get or set PDF page orientation

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Size
member.summary: Get or set PDF page orientation

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.LowQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets option to generate low quality PDF (shrink the result document space)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Grayscale
member.summary: Gets or sets option to generate grayscale PDF

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets zoom factor

member.summary: Gets or sets PDF page margins (in mm)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.PageWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF page width (in mm)

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.PageHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF page height (in mm)

member.summary: Gets or sets TOC generation flag

member.summary: Gets or sets custom TOC header text (default: "Table of Contents")

member.summary: Custom WkHtmlToPdf global options

member.summary: Custom WkHtmlToPdf page options

member.summary: Custom WkHtmlToPdf cover options (applied only if cover content is specified)

member.summary: Custom WkHtmlToPdf toc options (applied only if GenerateToc is true)

member.summary: Get or set custom page header HTML

member.summary: Get or set custom page footer HTML

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.ExecutionTimeout
member.summary: Get or set maximum execution time for PDF generation process (by default is null that means no timeout)

member.name: E:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.LogReceived
member.summary: Occurs when log line is received from WkHtmlToPdf process
member.remarks: Quiet mode should be disabled if you want to get wkhtmltopdf info/debug messages

member.name: P:NReco.PdfGenerator.HtmlToPdfConverter.Quiet
member.summary: Suppress wkhtmltopdf debug/info log messages (by default is true)

member.summary: Component commercial license information.
